previous.excerpt:
What is Shift?

 * Shift is an online platform where you can buy used cars and/or sell your used
   car. Their main competitors are Carvana and Vroom.

I've never heard of Shift..can they even compete with big players like Carvana?

 * Used car sales are actually consistently greater than new car…
previous.title: Shift ($SFT) DD: A rapidly growing competitor to Carvana that seems undervalued

localize.title: Shift（$SFT）DD：Carvana的一个快速增长的竞争对手，似乎被低估了。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
什么是Shift？

 * Shift是一个在线平台，你可以购买二手车和/或出售你的二手车。
   车。他们的主要竞争对手是Carvana和Vroom。

我从来没有听说过Shift......他们甚至可以与Carvana这样的大公司竞争吗？

 *二手车的销量其实一直都比新车大...
